title: iPhone 13 Pro
description: The iPhone 13 Pro features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, and a triple-camera system.

title: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 comes with a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, Exynos 2100, and a triple rear camera setup.

title: Google Pixel 6
description: Google Pixel 6 is powered by the Google Tensor chip and features a 6.4-inch AMOLED display with dual rear cameras.

title: OnePlus 9 Pro
description: OnePlus 9 Pro offers a 6.7-inch Fluid AMOLED display, Snapdragon 888, and Hasselblad-tuned quad cameras.

title: Xiaomi Mi 11 Ultra
description: Xiaomi Mi 11 Ultra features a 6.81-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 888, and a 50MP triple camera setup.
